alert.note: Alert for Southeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 24 at 1:31AM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...Through 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will continue to strengthen this evening with the strongest winds expected through 3 AM AKST Sunday morning.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
